effect_entries.effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

effect_entries.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
effect_entries.short_effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.
